price: Et quiconque exalte les injonctions sacrées d’Allah, alors cela fait partie de la piété des cœurs.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَۖ وَمَن يُعَظِّمۡ شَعَٰٓئِرَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّهَا مِن تَقۡوَى ٱلۡقُلُوبِ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika waman yuʿaẓẓim shaʿāira al-lahi fa-innahā min taqwā al-qulūbi
